website_summaries.verdict: A dazzling MacBook Pro case that features a distinct cut-out design.
pros: Unique design ensures you can quickly and effortlessly open your MacBook Pro and gain full access to all ports
Serves as a hard shell cover with a rubber oil paint coating that protects your MacBook Pro against damage and fingerprints
Includes vents for efficient heat disbursement
cons: May fall off your MacBook Pro easily
Less durable than many similar options

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case I couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case I couldn't be happier. Cut off apple log looking great! I was concern it wouldn't be right on point but it's better quality than I expected. Bottom is soft rubber material and top hard plastic but not cheap plastic is feels and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: abraham

customer_reviews.title: Bottom part of case does NOT fit properly
customer_reviews.text: I am sure I ordered the correct size by looking at my new mac model number. Top part of the case fit perfectly fine but, bottom part does not. Its shorter then my mac and doesn't match with picture shown on product picture. I will be returning it for sure because bottom part comes out easily.
customer_reviews.author: NC.Guy

customer_reviews.title: High quality case! (for MacBook Pro model A1708)
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this case for protection. The fit is absolutely precise without adding bulk and the case stays in place. You get two pieces of the whole setup: a case for the upper section (the screen) and another one for the bottom part. It is also easy to put on. The only one minor issue I have is the non-vibrant picture and color quality on the printed image which seems to be a departure from the advertised ones. Overall this is a good buy for minimalist MacBook Pro users
customer_reviews.author: GrEn

customer_reviews.title: Slick, sweet, smooth, and soft. all in one a good protective cover for a very nice price!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced the cover I bought the very day I bought the Macbook Pro laptop, several years back....living proof....when a new product comes out at $50, eventually it will come down considerably in price. I like this product better as it is not near as brittle as the original cover was....it chipped and cracked at several places, but then, it happened like that over 4 years, so it remains to be seen what this will show in it's old age. either way, we shall see what the future brings in 4 more years....till then, enjoy the nice design choices that didn't get offered in the past. See? All things improve with age!
customer_reviews.author: The Moose

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover because I loved the lonely tree option. In person, the colors are more vivid and eye catching then the pictures on the website. It is perfect! The cover fits my MacBook air model perfectly. I had difficulty getting it on at first because I hadn't lined it up correctly and it was difficult to "unsnap" in order to realign the top part of the case. This cover is meant to protect from scratches and spills; probably won't do much protecting if laptop gets dropped. If you are careful with your laptops, you will enjoy personalizing with these covers.
customer_reviews.author: A. Keating

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this case, but it's not very sturdy. I am fairly careful with my things, and this case has cracked corners after only five months. Update: The case lasted about 1.5 years before the cracks and wear and tear prompted me to replace it. I found a similar case that comes with keyboard and screen protector as well as a slipcase for a good $6 less. The print/image is also clearer and easier to read on the new one. I wouldn't buy this one again. It worked okay for a while, but it wasn't hardy enough for normal wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Huff

customer_reviews.title: Kinda misleading
customer_reviews.text: In the picture the apple logo lights on or it is white. When I got this product for my 2020 16" Macbook pro, it has a cut-out for the Apple icon. No lights or anything because newer MacBook does not have light on the lid! But why is mine is being cut out rather than 100% covered with white??? I am not quite happy with the way the graphics looked like. The Apple cut out took over nearly all white colors in the center making whole thing more muted than what it is shown for other perhaps smaller laptop size. Seller could have stated that no lights. I'll look for different design elsewhere since the galaxy is boring....
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Black hole case
customer_reviews.text: The galaxy image is a nice, sharp print. It fits the MacBook 12 perfectly (Bought in June 2017). The only thing is, the new MacBooks do not have an illuminated logo on the back as a power-saving feature. So it won't light up through the cutout. I didn't realize this when I bought this model. So now I just call it a black hole case. It's still nice-looking.
customer_reviews.author: LKB

customer_reviews.title: broke after less than 6 months use
customer_reviews.text: looks nice, got a few compliments. offers decent protection. one of the snap-on edges broke on mine after just a few months, leaving a sharp edge that caught on things. I tried to clip it off so it would be smooth, but it kept coming apart more and more, till I finally had to remove it. also, is much less smooth than mac book itself, so it can be harder to pull out of a laptop sleeve. bottom line, miss the tech21 case I had on my old mbp, that held up for years, offered better protection, and somehow still didn't make the laptop hard to get out of a sleeve. will probably get one of those again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Everett

customer_reviews.title: Broken corners, cracks, chips, uncomfortable edges
customer_reviews.text: Looks great until it breaks, which started in less than a year. No, I have not dropped my MBP, but both lower front corners have broken away, as has one corner of the lid. The base cover is coming apart around the cutout for venting. The material just seems to have gotten brittle in a very short time. Another annoying issue is that the way it clips over the front of the base means it digs into your wrists. I had a different cover for three years which was much more durable and comfortable, I only replaced it because it started looking a little worn, and this one looked "cool".
customer_reviews.author: EFlyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Love this case!
customer_reviews.text: Great item, easy to install, just snaps on real quick! Only thing that made me take away a star is that print on case isn't readable it's kinda sloppy but still looks cool tho. For the price it was I can't complain. I would buy again from buyer just not a thing that has print since details are kind of important thing for me and when I mean print I am talking about the small writing
customer_reviews.author: W. Melara

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is very pure quality, picture looks terrible. But I would go with it if I at least I got new product. Looks like someone already got it and returned it. Marks everywhere, dirty. And no it s not a plastic as you could think. On a picture u can see that under this plastic wrap this paper wrap already opened, they just put tape on it and wrap again on plastic and trying to sell it. Such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina DiNobile

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!  The tabs on the bottom cover hurt me when I type.  Otherwise, I like this.
customer_reviews.text: I can't really give the greatest rating on durability mainly because I haven't had this for very long. As far a softness, umm NO! It's very hard and the tabs that hold the bottom cover have TERRORIZED my forearms and wrists. When I type on my keyboard I feel the plastic digging into my skin. I've planned to file them down to soften or round the sharp edges. I'll update this review if that works out. The cover fits securely on the top and the bottom and I really like the design/art. I don't have any plans to get rid of this. For the price...meh, i'll modify it and go from there.
customer_reviews.author: MelloYello59

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged, looks like flimsy design
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged with cracks and a piece chipped out. Leads me to believe this not well made if it could be damaged that easily in shipping or prior to that. Returned to amazon prime for free. I will be selecting a different brand most likely although this company has nice designs. I prefer something that will not be damaged so easily and which isn’t so flimsy. On my old MacBook Pro I have a green plastic case which is very solid, much thicker and which has never had any damage at all.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as I first thought...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality of this laptop case. I was assuming it would be very similar to the plastic case I had that was thin, cracked easily and lasted just a short time. The case is beautiful to look at and feels so substantial! Very happy with my choice of covers! *I did feel the need to amend my review as I'm finding that the corners and small areas that hold the cover on the case are more fragile than I anticipated and are cracking. I have used the super glue twice and am disappointed that it was necessary.
customer_reviews.author: D. Page

customer_reviews.title: Poor Cheap Quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved the design that I bought. However, the materials that the plastic is made out of is just horrible. It started chipping at the corners without any wear. My Mac just stays at my desk for about 90% of the time and I've had this case for 3 months and the corners have chipped away. Then I tried to take the case off and of course I couldn't take it off without cracking it or nearly breaking it. The entire thing is just make with cheap plastic and should really cost $5 and not $20. If I could return this, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional at the same time
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case to replace a previously purchased incase cover that fell apart in short order. Overall, this KECC cover has all the expected features you would look for in a protective case. The top cover is made of some sort of plastic/foam material and has a nice apple cutout. The bottom has a good amount of vents as well as nice skid proof feet. In addition to all the function, it's a real attractive cover with very vibrant colors. I'm pretty satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Great case, sturdy and looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the soft touch to both the top of the case and the both, felt almost like suede material. While it isn't an HD quality picture/design I can't complain because the price for the quality is great! Careful if you have lotion or sweaty hands as the residue is easily transferable. Kind of bummed the "paint/color" of the top design doesn't curl down, leaving a white border across the edge all around. I'll probably dye it so the color matches. Aside from that the case is great, feels sturdy and looks awesome. Since I have an early 2011 MBP the cutout lights up beautifully and gets a lot of looks.
customer_reviews.author: Jr

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply printed borders :/
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with the quality of the top case... The sides around it were mostly white with blue specs and looked like the design hadn't been printed all the way down (kinda reminds me of a cardboard painting). The rest of the top cover is printed decently and the apple logo cutout is precisely shaped for my A1989. The bottom is a matte black and is prone to fingerprints. Watch out for that if you are a stickler for fingerprints (natural body oils stick on like crazy)... I'm bummed that I can't return this. I just can't deal with a case that lacks quality and is pricier than other brands with better reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Anna T.

customer_reviews.title: I would skip it
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I don't love it. The print isn't that nice, for 19.99 it's fair but it looks like a homemade photo print from the late 90's the sharpness and contrast leaves a but to be desired. I want to love it, I figured the photo wasn't going to be great, but I expected the case to like the one in their photos however it doesn't wrap around the bottom leaving the computer open to damage if dropped on that angle. I like the matte finish and the case feels grippy which should prevent from drops, I also like the apple cutout it is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: ClintClint

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how well it will hold up, VERY hard to put on the machine
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this was a nut buster to put on my 2020 Macbook Pro! It is a super tight fit, and it took about a half hour to get all the clips to attach. It's on now, but I have to say I prefer Speck cases, so when they make one for this, I'll buy it. But for now, this looks cool and cosmic, and I want to protect my machine from scratches and dings. I don't like the soft feel to the top of the cover. I feel like this will get trashed pretty easily. I prefer hard plastic all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Lioness

customer_reviews.title: Case cracks in the same spot TWICE!
customer_reviews.text: I have now ordered two of these and the same result: the bottom case cracked near the left front side of the MacBook Pro! Figured the first time was my mistake somehow even though I am very careful with my Mac. Then it happened again within a month of purchase in the same exact spot paying very close attention. It also scratched my Mac! $40.00 wasted and a scratch right where the crack is! Here is a photo of the crack and the scratch you can see. If I could give zero stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Tuckers Dad

customer_reviews.title: Very good protective cover for MBP with Touch bar
customer_reviews.text: Well made and fits the Mac Book Pro like a glove. Does not cover the ports. But folks using external port extenders attached to the body of MBP itself need to be aware that it may cause an interference. Using dongle like extenders should not have any issues. The Galaxy theme and colors are outstanding. Note that it is not a glossy finish, rather like a matte soft to touch surface. It may attract some dust and lint I suspect. Still very new to tell. The bottom cover has adequate vents to facilitate cooling as MBP uses its entire surface as heat sink. Hoping this will not be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dealzguy

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: First of all the colors are rich and the designs are memorable, I love these covers. This is my 2nd one after 2 years of my first design. These covers are as durable as they are supposed to be for a Mac laptop. With proper, adequate care these cases could last longer, but I had a couple of bad bumps and a drop or two that created cracks. But for that I would still have my original. Oh, and I will cover my laptop better.
customer_reviews.author: Gornata Ross

customer_reviews.title: Completely wrong size
customer_reviews.text: This product has stated everywhere, in the description of the item, on the packaging I received in the mail, on the wrap around the item, that it is for the macbook air 13". This is false, as the product was almost an inch wider than my macbook air 13" on both the top and side. Also, the cover print was poor quality, as it was slightly blurry and not very clear, especially the writing. It looked as though they tried to stretch the image too much. This product is very inaccurate and I would strongly suggest ordering from another seller to avoid wasting time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fit to 2020 macbook pro 13 model A2289
customer_reviews.text: The title and description says it fits to latest June 2020 purchase of macbook pro 13 Model A2289. The top cover fits but the bottom does not ft. IT MADE SCRATCHES TO MY BRAND NEW MAC. MAKE A NOTE DOES NOT FIT TO A2289 DOES NOT FIT TO A2289 DOES NOT FIT TO A2289 WILL SCRATCH YOUR MAC WILL SCRATCH YOUR MAC WILL SCRATCH YOUR MAC Do not buy and you will regret like me.
customer_reviews.author: xgalaxy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: I saw one of my classmates with this cover and fell in LOVE. I had to have it! I am so happy with the purchase!! It is so clear and beautiful and bright. I LOVE the brain and this is so right up my alley. It fit perfectly (I have the MacBook Pro 13) and I was pleasantly surprised to see the apple logo shine through perfectly in the middle of the brain. My previous case covered the entire logo, but this was so nice and shiny and beautifully placed. It adds a nice touch to the case now. I love picking up my laptop now and seeing this. Super happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, but not stellar
customer_reviews.text: I like this enough to keep it, I think, but it's not as top-quality as I expected. The material has a soft, weird feeling to it and doesn't sit flush against the back, which makes it obvious that it's a cover. The bottom part comes up over the lip of the MacBook Pro to click into place, which is great but makes typing almost painful because the plastic digs into my skin. I might take the bottom off. The quality of the picture isn't great either. I was expecting a more sleek look. I don't know. I wouldn't buy this again but I don't know if it's worth returning.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Nice laptop case...BUT....very sharp lips on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Initially I loved this case and I still like the monitor cover, but the bottom of the case has snaps that keep it connected to the keyboard area. There are 4 lis that slide over the base to keep it secure. Two of those plastic lips happen to fall exactly where I keep my wrists while I type and one of the two is cutting into my skin under my wrist. The edges of the plastic lip are sharp and rough and very annoying. I hate to have to remove the bottom cover, because I like the protection, but its very sharp and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Scuba Paws

customer_reviews.title: High quality, good design
customer_reviews.text: This case is awesome! It has a nice rubberized outside that helps it be slip resistant. It seems to be high-quality and the image is very clear. I always get concerned when purchasing printed items that the design will be poor quality or pixelated, but I am very impressed. My husband is already interested in getting one for his computer from the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Howell

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, unique and feels pretty rock solid
customer_reviews.text: I just recently bought a MacBook Air (my first mac laptop) and wanted to protect it. Saw so many positive reviews and youtube videos on this style and brand of cover that I thought it would be a good buy. I was impressed by the graphics and my daughter, who loves science, thought it was really cool too. It was easy to install and I feel. better about bringing my laptop with me when I got out. :)
customer_reviews.author: L. Tomoyasu

customer_reviews.title: Not really made for 12inch MacBook
customer_reviews.text: I love the space cover design, but it's really not built for the 12 inch MacBook. The bottom fits very well, but because of how the hinge/top of the laptop is designed, there's no hinge, so when you close the computer there's like a 1/4-1/2 inch overhang from the top shell. Also, the top shell is very thick for a shell, and the sides weren't painted. The top kind of felt like an afterthought. Missed opportunity.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my new MacBook case!! It's nice material I would highly recommend this to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but low quality material.
customer_reviews.text: After owning this for a little over 4 months I need to buy one again. The hooks are all broken so now there is nothing to hold it in place on the Mac. One of my first troubles came when I bought a multi port adapter and it wouldn’t work because the case prevented it from fitting into the usb-c ports. It comes with two usb, hdmi, rj45 ports on one side and the other side has two usb-c that fits into the macs ports but with the case it won’t fit. Keep that in mind when buying any case. This is a very nice case but with very bad quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Root de Passore

customer_reviews.title: The designs are awesome. However
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay case. The designs are awesome. However, the top comes off very easily. When resting your arms on the Mac your arms will start hurting because the latches are rough and will cause a dent in your forearm. And if you want to take off the bottom to change the case it is very difficult. I almost broke it. I wish this case had a more rubber feel because when you life up the Mac it is slippery. I have almost dropped my Mac a couple times. If you are the type of person who likes design over quality this case is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This case is stunning! I was able to fit the case onto my MacBook air with ease and it fits perfectly. A few things I like about the case are that it covers the MacBook without impairing you from opening it all the way, and the cutout on the back for the apple logo is a great touch for the space background. All in all this is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing & functional case
customer_reviews.text: This fit my 2019 15 Macbook Pro W Touch bar. It was a great find, and a nice price. I love the way it looks. Overall it isn't a hd/4k image nor did i think it would be but it is printed very nicely and i would give it 5 stars overall personally but i know others might expect a perfect image so i made it 4 on print quality. Very happy I stumbled upon this design as I had it on my old ipod touch back in the day and I love it. Has a apple cutout as well which i thought was neat.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY! Product and Print Quality is fantastic! 2019 MacBook Pro 15”
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing my first 2019 MacBook Pro 15” I knew I needed a reliable protective case for it and KEC caught my attention by far out of all the other products here on Amazon, because of the cool unique design selection they have to offer and as well as the compatibility. I love the way this design looks and I’ve received so many compliments so far. This laptop hard shell case cover was super easy to install. I’ve had this case for about a couple of weeks now and I have no complaints. Everything in the description was on point as far going into details with making sure you have the correct model for your device.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Blonigen

customer_reviews.title: Great case, but why does it need a hole for a logo that doesn’t light up?
customer_reviews.text: This is a great thin and yet durable case. Giving it 4 stars for one reason and one reason only. The Apple logo cutout is mostly pointless - other than being decorative it leaves that little bit of the case exposed to be scratched/damaged; and yet the Apple logo hasn’t lit up in at least the last 4 or 5 annual cycles of MacBooks (which is why most of these cases had the logo cutouts). If they eliminated the hole it would be a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Love the design
customer_reviews.text: This is a very beautiful case and I’ve gotten many compliments on it. However, it doesn’t feel like it’s clipped on properly even though I got the correct size for my laptop. I’m also not a fan of the texture on the front of the case. I thought it would be smooth, but there are little bumps all over—probably to be a part of the space design. Overall, it’s a cute case. I haven’t had it long, so I can’t talk about its true durability. We’ll see how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Terra

customer_reviews.title: a very annoyed college student
customer_reviews.text: Just got my cover and even after reading several reviews about it not fitting the model it says it would, I decided to chance it. Upon receiving it, it was immediately clear it was too large. I also ordered screen protectors for my laptop from a different seller for a 13 inch screen and those fit perfectly. Now after waiting for it for over a week I have to send back the cover, which will be a huge inconvinence. Learn to accurately describe your product. Sincerely, a very annoyed college student
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coolest Design, Bright Colors
customer_reviews.text: The appearance of the case is great. The text is little bit fuzzy (reason for 4 stars instead of 5) but not enough to bother me. The colors are very bold. The apple cutout part fits perfectly over the Apple logo. The bottom part doesn't cover up any of the USBc ports at all. This isn't a case that will prevent damage to the computer if you were to drop it (not sure if any of this style does - reason for 4 stars). I am totally happy I brought this case.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Nomad

customer_reviews.title: Laptop Case
customer_reviews.text: This laptop case is a good quality and looks great. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it shows fingerprints. The seller sent out an email ahead of time just to make sure that correct case for correct laptop was ordered. We didn't need their customer service for anything else but appreciated hearing from them ahead of time to make sure our order would be correct.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Installs perfectly – Easy
customer_reviews.text: This is just as pictured. It snapped on perfectly for my 15" A1990 MacBook Pro leaving all ports open for use. It's advertised to protect from scratches, not drops – and I can see how it will do that well. The only negative is that the small words printed on the top cover are a little blurry – not crisp and sharp but they are certainly readable. Plus, I'm probably picky because I'm a graphic designer. I'm really happy with the design – colorful and original. Not something I've seen anyone else have.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover fit my old MAC perfectly and it was easy to install. It looks great and is durable. This is holding up better than other covers I bought that didn't stay on and the holding pieces would break off. Not this product. It stays in place and cleans up nicely. I touched it with greasy hands and i cleaned it and it looks perfect.
customer_reviews.author: FS

customer_reviews.title: It's an open and shut case...
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't like cases for my computers, but after spending $1700 on a new MacBook Pro and nearly dropping it, I thought I could get over my dislike. Normally cases take up so much space and add so much weight but this case is well designed. I have clear access to all my ports and while the case does add some thickness and marginal weight, it's not nearly as bad as other hardshell cases I've used for previous Mac iterations. Also, the design is gorgeous and really shows well. I'd say the image on Amazon doesn't do this justice. The key is how well will it hold up. We shall see. But I have high hopes for this product.
customer_reviews.author: TujuMaster

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and easy to install,  but...
customer_reviews.text: I really like how this cover looks and fits. My MacBook Pro looks great with the photo and I appreciate how easy this was to install. I am surprised that after just over a month, the front corners have come off. It is just a small piece, but still...I'm not sure how it happened but it is odd that these tiny pieces broke off.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gold

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but chipped and cracking after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I like it but the corners and edges of the case have begun to chip off in the 5 months I've been using it. The graphic is beautiful and it has a matte feel to it. Just disappointed that now I have to find another case to protect the vulnerable corners on my MBP. It protected my MBP and did it's job so that's good, but if it had lasted longer then I would have rated it 4 or 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: lucky10

customer_reviews.title: Unbiased Review
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied. The price is fair for the case. I have the new upgraded MacBook TouchBar 15 inch and it fits perfect. It has nice cutouts on the side for ventilation. The ports are easily accessible. The quality is impressive actually. My favorite part is the rubber stoppers on the bottom, prevents it from shifting as you're typing. Everybody keeps asking where did I get my case.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Torres

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 2020 13 inch MacBook air perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2020 13 inch MacBook air perfectly.. Completely covered top and completely covered bottom. The cut outs are perfect on the sides as well. The print quality is brilliant and the case has a nice feel to it. For the money I don’t think you can beat this case. I’m very careful with my things so I’m sure it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE - this is completely ME.
customer_reviews.text: I have never bought a Mac cover before - I typically WRITE notes, appointments and ideas (in pencil) on my Mac. I just bought a new Mac and decided I would treat it better. Everyone who has seen this has asked me about it - it is completely ME - LEFT BRAIN/RIGHT BRAIN cover. So far is it durable and fun. The ONLY thing that annoys me slightly is the bottom half has a slight lip that my hand gets caught on. im sure ill get to used to it. I definitely think this was worth the money to keep my computer from scratches - more importantly, it is a conversation starter and I like to talk. haha
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Reiman

customer_reviews.title: edges are white
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this product, it is a beautiful cutout and fit for the my 2018 macbook pro, but when i opened the top piece the edges of the print are white and unfinished, which are clearly visible open or closed. I am very disappointed in the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eventhorizon333

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover! Its pretty neat how the apple when its lit up looks like a galaxy. It doesn't disappoint. The only thing that I found was that the lid sometimes doesn't quite stay completely latched on in the front (or top if its open). I keep having to push it back on. I have the right model so I think its just a matter of the tabs being slightly small. Its not a big deal and I'm not taking it off. I accidentally ordered 2 (whoops) I can open the other one and see if maybe if its just this one. Otherwise I love it!
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Quality and fit are not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Quality is not very good. Worked for a few months, but then fell apart. It's brittle plastic, so it will crack/break just like you might expect. Also, it did not quite "snap in" in regards to the fit on my Mid-2014 model Macbook Pro Retina 15". I took away 1 star for the fit, 1 star for the construction, and the 3rd star for the price. I think it is over priced for a case that just lasts 4 months with regular use.
customer_reviews.author: S K

customer_reviews.title: this case is great. It fits well to the brand new macbooks ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm SO upset. As far as functionality, this case is great. It fits well to the brand new macbooks with the touchbar and smaller ports, HOWEVER, this is INCREDIBLY dull. Don't think you're going to get something as bright as in the advertised picture. I was so angry I almost sent it back, but the packaging was literally a piece of plastic over the case. I would NEVER recommend this laptop case.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Truxal

customer_reviews.title: Peeling off after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: It looked beautiful at the beginning. After 2 weeks, the outer clear layer started to bubble and peel. You can see pot marks all over where the outer layer has peeled up. It still looks okay from afar, but close up, it doesn’t look too great. Now, all of the tabs that attach to the cover have broken off rendering it useless. I do not recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: The Kat

customer_reviews.title: Really blurry text, but otherwise looks good
customer_reviews.text: I removed two stars because The small text on the Left Side of brain is completely illegible, which is sad because it is worth reading. I wrote over it with a fine point sharpie to make it a little easier to read, and doodled in the blank space to give the left side more character. Otherwise the case looks great. Vibrant colors, feels like good quality material, and good ventilation on the underside. Fits my 13” MacBook Air perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: pixychild

customer_reviews.title: Quality print, fit perfectly, good value
customer_reviews.text: Well I was bit nervous trying one of these cases u have to say it was nicer then I expected. It fit perfectly on my MacBook Pro and it’s nice and snug. Print quality is really nice and has a textured feel to it. So far it’s been holding up good and I’ll update my review in a month on how it’s holding up but for the price I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Schpeen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Case
customer_reviews.text: This case is absolutely wonderful and beautiful. It was so easy to install and just like all other computer cases, it does require some work to take off. The case is dark enough so when it’s dirty, it can’t be notice. The cutout of the Apple sign in the computer is just right. Lastly, I don’t know the durability yet as I haven’t drop my computer because I paid so much for it, I always keep my eye on it. I would recommend this case for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Gabby L.

customer_reviews.title: Does for the 2020 model
customer_reviews.text: Okay so after I purchased this I saw a review mentioning that it doesn’t actually fit the new 2020 MacBook Pro 13”. It turns out this isn’t actually the case and the case fits properly and snaps into place. The print looks great but does have a bit of a faded look to it. Overall fits great and so far hasn’t caused any major issues
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Don't be Fooled Again!
customer_reviews.text: I'm responsible for being duped. I should know that the Apple logo doesn't glow or shine — like in the picture. But that's the way they made it look. And it looks like the stars glow (they don't). Without that, it looks like a black case that's been next to someone wantonly using an electric toothbrush. TOTAL RIPOFF! On the positive side, it fits well if you want a toothpaste pre-splattered case.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great Enclosure
customer_reviews.text: Nice hard shell for protection, Clips right on, unclips easily enuff, bottom half clips on as well and has slight gap between computer and on the bottom with air vents for air circulation to keep cool and molded sides perfect for your plug ins. I had this for several weeks now I spent a lot of time burning CD's to computer and no issues yet, not even heating up. The top cover art looks great and done in flat instead of glossy, so you don't get glare on it. Great case cover / enclosure for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Osullivan

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this case
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this case. Of course the colors could have been brighter and more realistic, but considering the price, the quality is really good. It also feels very light and soft. I get compliments about it. However, I would recommend you perhaps to increase the price and print a more realistic cases. Perhaps, you can sell only the lid cover, thus you do not make them too expensive. But generally, I would recommend others, especially college students who can not spend too much on a case, to buy this beautiful case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: The product has done what it was meant to do, which is protect the computer. I only have two complaints. When installing the case, it takes a little muscle and it feels like its going to break! The second is the print quality, it seems a little distorted BUT NOT BAD! If you are looking for perfection when it comes to quality, then maybe this product will bother you, but, for the price and quality, its a great product and I would definitely consider buying another one again.
customer_reviews.author: cocosos

customer_reviews.title: 12/10 would get
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I was really skeptical about how much I would like this case, I had bought 2 different cases before this, one by speck (garbage) and one by I blason I believe (also garbage) so I was already in a bad place when I received this. The packaging was very low budget from the looks of it which initially concerned me. But as soon as I felt the case in my hands and put it on my laptop it blew my mind. The quality was great, the feel of it, the look, the fit, everything about it. 12/10 would recommend over any other MacBook Pro 15 inch case on amazon
customer_reviews.author: hussein

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I was very wary on what computer case to choose, but this one was exactly what I was hoping for. It snaps right on and off, not difficult to use at all. I have been using it for a few months and it is still in great condition. The design looks exactly like the photos and it is of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 8 yo grandson’s refurbished laptop that he needs for Zoom school. It fits well, and he loves the galaxy pattern on the cover. His sister chose a floral pattern for her laptop, so they’re easy to tell apart. I bought them for the grandkids because I love mine so much.
customer_reviews.author: Delores C.

customer_reviews.title: THIS DOES NOT FIT THE 2020 MODEL A2289,
customer_reviews.text: IT won't snap on the bottom. The label says 2017, not 2020 but I tried it "just in case" and it won't snap in place or stay on.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marturano

customer_reviews.title: Fits Like a Glove
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! Fits like a glove. The case that I had before this one has a similar message but was a very hard plastic so it only held up for about a year with very little use and then started cracking everywhere because the plastic had become brittle. I hope that this one holds up better because it is more of a fiberous, flexible and a softer plastic and the fit is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Loved this case but peeling.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this case and got many compliments but I am disappointed that after having it on for a while, it started peeling. The image seems solid but the clear top (almost like a clear nail polish coating) is peeling and cracking making the image dull. The case is still snug on my computer and I feel it protects as well as in the beginning. Just disappinted in the way it looks now and not sure if I would rebuy.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Beauty is only skin deep
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured, and fits my MacBook Pro 15 inch (with touch bar) perfectly. Nice matte finish. UPDATE: It has been just under a year, and my MacBook Pro crashed, and when I took it in for service they needed the case off. The case had previously been cracking periodically around the edges and coming off in pieces, but it was doing a good job protecting it. However, when I had to take it completely off for the service tech it was almost impossible to get off and just crumbled into pieces. So, I will be looking for another case for my MacBook Pro. Beauty is only skin deep.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, though one minor flaw
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely beautiful! I love the feel of the rubberized case and unlike other cases of this type, it doesn't affect the vibrancy of the color! The only reason I gave it 4 starts was because I wish that they would 1) have the apple cut out lined up with the apple (close but not quite) and 2) that they'd have that cutout section actually covered (so use a clear, white, or frosted glass colored insert there). This minor tweak would do a lot to keep the Macbook it's on protected completely.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: First I am 38 years old my Mac does not go outside. Or get slung around or tossed aside. I may use while sitting on the sofa or laying on the bed. I have not had this cover for more then a few months and yet the sides and corners are chipping off like super cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with quality, trashed after less than 2 months of gentle use.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this toward end of August, started using it mid September. As of today, with less than two months of light use, the top cover no longer stays on and cracked at the bottom. I’m totally disappointed in this product and would not buy it again. I will note, to be fair, I haven’t yet contacted the company. If they respond to me to resolve I will update this post.
customer_reviews.author: HaveLessLiveHappy

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad cover if you must have one.
customer_reviews.text: I have a MacBook Pro, and I've never been partial to protective cases for my laptops (phone and tablets are a different story). My dad has a MacBook Air, and he needed this. His old case had gone to *#%&. Not quite a "5-star" purchase, but pretty good. I took off a star because they hounded me into submitting a review right after the product was bought. How about some time to use it? Jeez...
customer_reviews.author: Willie G.

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 2020 MacBook Pro 13'
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid this would not fit my new computer but it did, perfectly. I have the 2020 MacBook Pro 13' with 4 ports. The colors are vibrant and the material is just hard plastic so I cannot expect it hold up to a complete drop but it protects from scratches and other light dings. If you want complete drop protection do not buy this, if you want light to medium, its perfect and what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: CreeTree

customer_reviews.title: I got a date out of it
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this a fantastic product, but it is a great conversation starter. Seriously, go to a coffee shop and just wait. I got a date out of it the first time I used it and we’re still dating. I had given up on dating and was a hot mess express that day. He used a good line too. “So which side are you? Right brain or left brain?” Very smooth. If you’re in a relationship, get it anyways because it is a good product and it really protects your MacBook. However, if you’re single and looking for someone intellectual to have a good convo with AND all that other good stuff ( ;) ) get this. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Reff

customer_reviews.title: As described!
customer_reviews.text: I havent had it stand up against any possible damage but first look thoughts: it feels exactly like I wanted. That smooth, soft matte. It IS a hard case. The print quality of the graphics is actually pretty good. I was expecting less! It was easy enough to get on, though sometimes it felt like I had to start at a specific place for it to snap on easier. So far I'm happy. If anything happens, I'll make a future note.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compliments on this case
customer_reviews.text: In the few days after putting this case on, I got lots of compliments from friends and colleagues. The print is really beautiful, but also conducive to stickering. The case seems durable, but time will tell. The only thing that could be better is that the case shows fingerprints a lot, something I've found hasn't happened with other cases I've bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop cover, think it will keep my macbook safe.
customer_reviews.text: This cover looks great and was easy to install. It's heavy, but i wanted something to stop be from breaking yet another macbook, and this seems to be very durable and protective. The bottom cover does slide off on its own sometime, i wish it latched on a tad better. But overall a great value.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Hanley

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this! The fit is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! The fit is amazing; so amazing that I accidentally put it on the wrong way and had a lot of trouble getting it off. Lol. I love the matte rubberized feeling of the case. I also love the cutout of the apple so that the light can shine through when my laptop is on. Also, love the small stands on the bottom of the laptop case so that my laptop is slightly above the table, allowing for better air circulation. I get so many compliments on it because come on! Who doesn't love space designs? I would definitely purchase more from them!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love the design. For those that are complaining about how you can see the print marks on the case, they are not very apparent unless you are actually looking for them. It is a matte finish, so you should not expect it to look glossy. It is a little loose fitting, but not enough to stop me from using it or that hinders the protective qualities. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: momoftwins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Case, Solid Protection, Well Worth The Money!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this case! When I saw the pictures online, I was immediately drawn to it! When it arrived, I was even more in love with it! The pictures on here do not do it proper justice. The colors are so deep and so bold. The case is pretty durable and strong. The design/print is smooth with absolutely zero flaws. I am beyond happy with this case! I may buy another design so I have some customization options. :) Thank you so much! I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly fine
customer_reviews.text: After confirming (repeatedly both before and after I ordered) that this is the correct size cover for my MBPro 15" I placed the order and it arrived. It is a perfectly acceptable plastic cover for an MBPro. The cut out for the apple (which no longer glows like the old ones did) is pretty cool and perfectly placed. The printwork on the plastic is great and matched the photo on the product page perfectly. Other than that, not much to say. I would give it 5 stars but there is nothing about it that grabs me and makes me say WOW!
customer_reviews.author: Kian Sandjideh

customer_reviews.title: I love my new Mac Book cover
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Mac Book cover. Perfect fit, very thin,well made.Now I don have to worry about scratching my Mac Book :) I got it in a wood print.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and the art work design too; Wraps and fit perfect to the laptop. Also very easy to install and durable. Protect the laptop from scratch, water and dust. The bottom help to bring out the heat from the laptop and is very light. Make sure to order the right size by using the model number of you laptop and the case will fit perfect. Good quality; I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Edir

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: I love this Macbook Pro cover. It fits perfect looks really nice. Make sure when ordering item you look at the model number of your macbook. Some come with keyboard covers some do not if you want the one with the keyboard cover for the Macbook Pro touch ID it costs a few extra dollars. Look for the $22.99 one.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as pretty as pictured but still very nice. I like the feel of the top cover. The back is just basic black plastic. Mine had a scratch when it arrived where packaging was already sliced. Not a major defect and you don't really see the bottom much. This cover will not be quite as protective as my last one because the "apple" is cut out and will not be protected from liquid seeping in. I don't plan for any liquid to be near, so we should be OK.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: This case is pretty good. I think I was expecting something a bit harder and sturdier; it was flimsier than I thought. But it does the trick. I would say it mostly protects from scratches and dings, so don’t expect it to protect it from falls. The quality of the print is decent, but when you look really closely it has some graininess to it. But for the price, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Umais

customer_reviews.title: beautiful plastic shell with cut out for Apple logo.
customer_reviews.text: Shell adds protection and tays on Mac. Does not seem to have any problems in materials. The only thing I don't like is that the cutout for the Apple logo does not sit totally flat with the cover of the Mac. I will have to remove top cover to remove dust and things that will get stuck in there.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi McDermott

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS COVER!
customer_reviews.text: I really LOVE this cover! It's so unique and everyone asks where I got it from. It's really good quality, super cute and does it's job. I only gave it 4 stars because it was so hard to install. I thought I was going to break it when I was putting it on but thankfully I didn't! It's super snug and I won't be removing it!
customer_reviews.author: Wichitagirl

customer_reviews.title: Top of case is a challenging fit for A1465
customer_reviews.text: This specific case is a 2 piece plastic snap on type. I got it for my MacBook Air 11" A1465. The bottom of the case fits well. The top decorative part of the case did not want to completely snap at first. It took about 10 minutes of shifting and force to get all the snaps to clip on. I ended up leaving a couple scratches on the edge of the MacBook in the process. The image quality is moderate and I would have preferred a more glossy finish but overall I like the case and it seems like it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: ZYX89

customer_reviews.title: I like the design and the top half is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and the top half is perfect, fit's like a glove but the bottom part? Slides off easily. Like, it doesn't snap on at ALL and every time I pick up the MacBook it just slips. You have to be very careful in using this and when handling your computer.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: but the case itself feels sturdy enough. I have a MCP with Retina (A1502) ...
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built case and mesmerizing design. I have yet to drop my computer, but the case itself feels sturdy enough. I have a MCP with Retina (A1502) and it fits perfectly. It is a thicker and heavier feeling plastic. There might be some issues with quality assurance however. I bought two of these (one with another design) and the other one had some warpage on the display housing cover. A girl in my class had the same design on her sweatpants, and it allowed me to strike up a conversation with her. If you ask me, that is more than enough justification for the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Lo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: in 2014 I bought Macbook Pro 13" model and ordered this one. Till date I had not a single issue and it fits well. I have been able to open and close it few times just to see if there is any dust going between case and laptop or not. But every time it looked great. Recently my brother in law bought the 15" one and I told him to get this one and it just arrived today. It fits perfect just like it happened to me. I highly recommend this product to protect their macbooks.
customer_reviews.author: JAY PATEL

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful case!  Poor packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The case is really nice looking. Fixes the MacBook perfectly! The reason why I gave it four stars instead of five is because a small piece broke off the case due to the ineffectual packaging. It didn't affect the case's ability to snap onto and stay on the laptop. The case needs to be better packaged with more between the top and bottom case than a flimsy piece of plastic that is no protection against parts breaking off. Considering, I'm lucky that a bigger chunks or multiple chunks didn't break off.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: It looks same as the images I saw when I ordered it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Space Galaxy for A1398. The actually cover I received looked just like the images I saw when I ordered it. The color of cover doesn't extend around the sides of the cover, for it look more plain white. But that is a minor thing that is barely noticeable. For the price I bought it for - it is well worth the purchase, for it looks great. I only had it for a couple weeks, and I took it on a plane travel trip and you have to pull your laptops out for security check, and so far it is seems to be holding up in the durability department with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: One More

customer_reviews.title: Functional and lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.text: This a sturdy case that actually protects my Mac! It's not the cheap plastic that cracks and shatters at the tiniest bump. I love the design and people notice it. I have gotten lots of compliments on it! One time I was in Starbucks, and a barista called from behind the counter, "I love your case!" Actually, I do, too!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Huntley

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I really like this laptop case. I was trying not to expect much (compared to what I saw on the Apple website) but I am very pleased with it. It fits great and was easy to apply. It looks nicer in person than on the pictures. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JES

customer_reviews.title: A Very Stellar Purchase - Out of this World Tight Fit
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE IT. No more sliding on my desk at school. No more scratches on the original finish, and well of course it looks STELLAR!! Fits like a kid glove and protected even in the huge booksack I drag back and forth to teach class everyday at the high school, plus less of a chance now that when my other gear rolls off the seat driving code somewhere my Mac will get damaged. All this and I could afford a new replacement cord as well YEA!
customer_reviews.author: ParaMedicMom

product_meta.title: KECC Laptop Case for MacBook Pro 13" (2020/2019/2018/2017/2016) Plastic Hard Shell Cover A2289/A2251/A2159/A1989/A1706/A1708 Touch Bar (Blue)
feature_bullets: MacBook Pro 13 Inch Case (2020/2019/2018/2017/2016, With or Without Touch Bar) Cover is for model number A2289/A2251/A2159 / A1989 / A1706 / A1708 ONLY. It is NOT COMPATIBLE with OLD MacBook Pro 13" with Retina Display (A1502 / A1425) and OLD MacBook Pro 13" with CD Drive (A1278). Please CHECK YOUR MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER BEFORE YOU PURCHASE TO ENSURE YOU GET THE CORRECT SIZE.
Cut Out Design, Shines through the case. Design lets you Open/Close your MacBook all the way and Full Access to All Ports.
MacBook Hard Shell Cover contains a layer of Rubber Oil Paint for a Smooth Rubberized Exterior Texture - Prevent Fingerprints, Slipping, Scratches, Drops, Dirt, Smudges and Other Damages.

Sleek, Glossy 2 Piece Design - Easy to Install and Take Off. 4 Rubberized Feet keeps your MacBook Laptop Notebook Stable and Secure. Bottom Shell Case Cover Vented for Maximum Heat Dissipation and Disbursement.
KECC MacBook Lapop Shell Case Cover is very Slim and light weight. Easy and Convenient to Carry Around with your bags.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars5,276 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
